title: Friday Pt2: Tagovailoa Reaction, Week 4 matchups, Scott Pioli, UK Q&A, GMFB Jam, and Fish and Picks!
itunes:title: Friday Pt2: Tagovailoa Reaction, Week 4 matchups, Scott Pioli, UK Q&A, GMFB Jam, and Fish and Picks!
description:
Part Two of the Good Morning Football Podcast begins with reaction to Tua Tagovailoa's injury on Thursday Night.  Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty look ahead to more Week 4 matchups before Fmr NFL Exec Scott Pioli explains his excitement over the Eagles and disappointment in the Raiders.  The UK Q&A is all about food and the table gives their Week 4 Fantasy duos in GMFB Jam.  We wrap the week in London with Fish and Picks!

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
